participant_1.background:
I take a walk in the canyon before starting my work.
I wish I could be more active, but I love to cuddle with my cats on the couch.
My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby.
I watch highlights of basketball games on my phone while I eat breakfast.
I love the wedding planning process and get a thrill out of helping people create their dream weddings.

participant_2.background:
I love my parents very much and am grateful for all they have done for me.
I'm single and focused on my career.
starbucks is my favorite hang out spot.
i work in a doctors office.
i ride my bicycle everywhere.

content.text: Hi there! I'm glad to meet you.
Hi there! Nice to meet you too!
I love to take walks in the canyon before starting my work day. Do you like to be active?
I love to ride my bike everywhere! It's my main mode of transportation.
That's great! I wish I was more active. I love to cuddle with my cats on the couch.
I love my cats too! They're my best friends.
I'm glad you love your cats. My parents aren't really into LARP, but they support my hobby.
That's great that they support you! What's LARP?
LARP stands for live action role-playing. It's a type of outdoor game where people dress up as characters and act out a story.
That sounds really fun! I've never heard of that before.
It's a lot of fun! I love the creativity and the sense of community.
I can see how that would be fun! I'm glad you have a hobby that you love.
Thanks! I'm glad you like your bike too.
Yeah, it's great! I love being able to get around without having to use a car.
